message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it would be very valuable to your work.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'd really like to make a deal with you, but I need to be within my budget.
